entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , White River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:15 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Flurries at times heavy beginning near midnight. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 late in the evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
